cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntitlementVisitable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Entitlement, Resource, User

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEntitlementVisitable
    Abstract class representing an entitlement item (could be a Role, Permission, or Resource) that is included in the HouseMate Model Entitlement Service. Attributes here are common to all items in the Entitlement service, regardless of type. All entitlement items (regardless of type) have the following attributes:
    • must have an ID that is a unique GUID
    • must have a name
    • must have a description
    Certain specific types of Entitlement items may have additional required attributes. Each Item that lives in the Entitlement service is a unique item. Entitlement items may be added to the entitlement catalog and made returnable by calling IEntitlementServiceAPI.getInventory().
    See Also:
    Role, cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement.Service, Permission, Entitlement, IEntitlementServiceAPI
